Recommended users: Jhin and Zeri
items.name: Pulse Silencer

items.desc:
All Shields are @ShieldEffectivenessPercent*100@% more effective on the holder. Every @SiphonFrequency@ seconds, siphon @HealthSiphonAmt*100@% of the owner's max Health from the current target and convert it to a Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Shielding This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_MordekaiserItem_TotalShielding@

Recommended users: Mordekaiser, Jax, and Sejuani
items.name: Corrupted Chassis

Recommended users: Sejuani, Jax, and Mordekaiser
items.name: Cybercoil

items.desc:

Recommended users: Naafiri, Jhin, and Varus

Recommended users: Jhin and Zeri

Recommended users: Zeri and Naafiri

Total Damage Dealt This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_JaxItem_TotalDamageReflected@

Recommended users: Jax, Mordekaiser, and Sejuani
items.name: Repulsor Lantern

items.desc:
Abilities and Attacks mark enemies for @MarkDuration@ seconds. Heal for @HealingPercent*100@% of damage dealt to marked enemies.

Total Healing This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_SejuaniItem_TotalHealing@

Recommended users: Sejuani, Jax, and Mordekaiser
items.name: Hijacked Cybercoil

items.desc:
Every other attack is charged, dealing @ShockDamage*100@% of the target's max health as physical damage and reduces their Armor by @FlatArmorReduction@.

Total Charge Damage This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_ZeriItem_TotalLightningDamage@

Recommended users: Zeri and Naafiri
items.name: Fully-Charged Flux Capacitor

items.desc:
Gain @BonusPercentHP*100@% health. Every @Interval@ seconds, deal @PercHealthDamage*100@% of the holder's max health as magic damage to all enemies within @Radius@-hex.

Total Damage Dealt This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_JaxItem_TotalDamageReflected@

Recommended users: Jax, Mordekaiser, and Sejuani
items.name: Nullifier Lantern

items.desc:
All Shields are @ShieldEffectivenessPercent*100@% more effective on the holder. Every second, siphon @HealthSiphonAmt*100@% of the owner's max Health from the nearest @NumEnemies@ enemies and convert it to a Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Shielding This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_MordekaiserItem_TotalShielding@

Recommended users: Mordekaiser, Jax, and Sejuani
items.name: Harmonized Chassis

items.desc:
When you damage an enemy, store @StoredDamage*100@% of your damage dealt to them. After @MarkDuration@ seconds, deal the stored damage to the target and the nearest enemy as physical damage.

Total Shockwave Damage This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_NaafiriItem_TotalShockwaveDamage@

Recommended users: Naafiri, Jhin, and Varus
items.name: Hyper Fangs

items.desc:
Use this on an Arcana champion to change Arcana's effect to theirs.

Ahri: Gain Ability Power for each 3-star champion.
Hecarim: Units holding items gain Damage Reduction and Attack Damage.
Tahm Kench: Gain Health for each active trait.
Xerath: Abilities deal bonus true damage for each Charm purchased.
Emblem: Gain Damage Amp for each Spatula item equipped.
items.name: Arcana Signifier

items.desc:
After dealing damage @MaxNumStacks@ times, gain @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT12_Faerie_DamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA% for the rest of combat.

After dealing damage @RadiantMaxStacks@ times, gain @RadiantMaxHealth*100@% maximum Health, @RadiantOmnivamp*100@% Omnivamp, and @RadiantDamageAmp*100@% damage amp.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.
items.name: Eternal Monarch's Crown

items.desc:
After dealing damage @MaxNumStacks@ times, gain @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT12_Faerie_DamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA% for the rest of combat.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.
items.name: Faerie Queen's Crown

items.desc: The holder of this item is stunned. This effect ends when they die.
items.name: Cursed Quicksilver

items.desc:
Use this on a Briar to grant her @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT12_BoundHealthGain@ %i:scaleHealth% in exchange for @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT12_BoundHealthCost@ of your player health.

In Choncc's Treasure, this item is improved at Stage 3-1 and 4-1.

[Consumable - This item disappears when used.]
items.name: A Light Snack

items.desc: The holder of this item sets their attack speed cap to @ASCap@ and cannot gain mana or cast. Every time they are attacked, the attacker gains <TFTBonus>@BonusAttackSpeed*100@%</TFTBonus> Attack Speed.
items.name: Cursed Guinsoo's Rageblade

items.desc: The holder deals @NegativeDamageAmp*100@% less damage. They also take @DamageRatio*100@% of their max health as true damage per second, and heal Milio for the same amount.
items.name: Cursed Hextech Gunblade

items.desc:
Gain @HealShieldPower*100@% increased healing and shielding. Heal for @QueenHealRatio*100@% of the Queen's damage dealt.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.
items.name: Queenguard's Armor

items.desc:
Gain @HealShieldPower*100@% increased healing and shielding. Heal for @QueenHealRatio*100@% of the Queen's damage dealt.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.
items.name: Armor of Eternal Devotion

items.desc:
Your team heals a percentage of their max Health every @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.1:Seconds@ seconds.

When a champion dies, they retreat to the sidelines to cheer on your team. Your team's healing increases for each cheering champion.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.1:BaseHealthRegen@% %i:scaleHealth% base, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.1:HealthRegenPerMascot@% %i:scaleHealth% per cheering champion
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.2:BaseHealthRegen@% %i:scaleHealth% base, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.2:HealthRegenPerMascot@% %i:scaleHealth% per cheering champion
items.name: Mascot

items.desc: Every @Duration@ seconds, revive the strongest ally that hasn't been revived yet at @HPPercent*100@% of their maximum Health.
items.name: Tome of Mending

items.desc:
After @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.1:FirstDelay@ seconds of combat, the Dragon strikes the board, dealing true damage and stunning all enemies. Allies gain Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.1:TrueDamageHPRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% damage, Stuns for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.1:StunDuration@ seconds, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.1:AttackSpeedBuff*100@% %i:scaleAS%.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.2:TrueDamageHPRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% damage, Stuns for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.2:StunDuration@ seconds, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.2:AttackSpeedBuff*100@% %i:scaleAS%.
After an additional @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.2:SecondDelay@ seconds, the Dragon strikes again.
items.name: Dragonlord

items.desc:
Gain a spotlight hex.
Combat start: the unit standing in the spotlight gains bonus stats.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.1:DamagePercent*100@% %i:scaleDA% and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.1:ManaPerSecond@ %i:scaleMana% per second.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.2:DamagePercent*100@% %i:scaleDA%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.2:ManaPerSecond@ %i:scaleMana% per second, and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.2:OmnivampPercent*100@% %i:scaleSV%. Gain another spotlight hex.
items.name: Socialite

items.desc: Kayle deals @DamageAmpPercent*100@% more damage. When she casts, she fires two waves.
items.name: Tome of Power

items.desc: Kayle deals @DamageAmpPercent*100@% more damage. Her attacks now hit in a @HexRadius@-hex radius around the target
items.name: Tome of Swiftness

items.desc:
Gain 2 Mountain hexes in the front row.
Combat start: units standing on a Mountain hex gain a Shield and permanent bonus Health.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mountain.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mountain.1:ShieldValue@ Shield, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mountain.1:PermBonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mountain.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mountain.2:ShieldValue@ Shield, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mountain.2:PermBonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%. The entire front row becomes Mountain hexes.
items.name: Mountain

items.desc:
Gain Shimmerscale items. These items give gold as well as combat power.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shimmerscale.1:MinUnits@)Gain Goldmancers Staff. At Stage @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shimmerscale.1:SecondItemStage@-@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shimmerscale.1:SecondItemRound@ gain Draven's Axe.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shimmerscale.2:MinUnits@)Gain Crown of Champions.
items.name: Shimmerscale

items.desc:
Your team's takedowns grant stacks of Conquest. After gaining enough Conquest, open War Chests full of loot!

Your team gains Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror:PercentIncreasePerChest*100@% for each War Chest opened.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror.1:ADAPBase*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%; @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror.1:StacksPerKill@x Conquest
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror.2:ADAPBase*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%; @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror.2:StacksPerKill@x Conquest

War Chests Opened: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror_ChestsCompleted@
Current Stats: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror_CurrentADAP@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
items.name: Conqueror

items.desc:
Your team gain bonus Health, Attack Damage and Ability Power, which increases by 1% every time you spend gold on a Shop reroll.

After each combat, gain a 1 gold reroll for that round. Your first reroll each round grants @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk:FIRST_ROLL_BONUS@% bonus instead!

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk.1:MinUnits@ )@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk.1:BONUS_HEALTH@ %i:scaleHealth% and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk.1:BONUS_AD_AP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk.2:MinUnits@ )@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk.2:BONUS_HEALTH@ %i:scaleHealth% and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk.2:BONUS_AD_AP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%

Current Bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_Punk_CurrentBonus@%
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_Punk_CurrentHealthBonus@ %i:scaleHealth% and @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_Punk_CurrentADBonus@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
items.name: Punk

items.desc:
Summon a Hero named Kayle and evolve her as you level up!

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver.1:MinUnits@) When you reach level @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:FirstArmoryLevel@, Kayle upgrades to 2-star. Pick a supportive effect.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver.2:MinUnits@) Kayle evolves again at levels @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:SecondArmoryLevel@, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:ThirdArmoryLevel@ and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:FourStarUpgradeLevel@:
Level @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:SecondArmoryLevel@: Pick a combat effect.
Level @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:ThirdArmoryLevel@: Kayle upgrades to 3-star. Pick a combat effect.
Level @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:FourStarUpgradeLevel@: Kayle upgrades to 4-star.
items.name: Storyweaver

items.desc:
Gain a Glacial Mallet. Attacks from champions holding a mallet have a @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.1:ProcPercent*100@% chance to stun their target for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.1:StunDuration@ second and deal bonus magic damage.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.1:BonusDamage@ magic damage.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.2:BonusDamage@ magic damage. Gain another Glacial Mallet.
items.name: Glacial

items.desc:
Use the Pilot Selector to choose a Pilot. Combat start: the Pilot jumps into a Mech.

The Mech has the Traits and items of its Pilot, and gains a percent of the pilot's Attack Damage and max Health. When the Mech dies, the Pilot(s) are ejected with @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_MechPilot.1:EjectedPilotHealthPercent@% of their max Health.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_MechPilot.1:MinUnits@) Mini-Mech: @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_MechPilot.1:MechCombinedADRatio*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleHealth%
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_MechPilot.2:MinUnits@) Super-Mech: @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_MechPilot.2:MechCombinedADRatio*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleHealth%. The 2 nearest units to the Pilot also jump into the Mech.
items.name: Mech-Pilot

items.desc:
Your team gains @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro:BaseASPct@% %i:scaleAS% Attack Speed.

For each kill, your team creates an infernal cinder that you collect the next round. For every @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro:NumCinders@ cinders you collect, your team gains @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro:ASPctPerNumCinders@% more %i:scaleAS%.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro.1:NumCindersPerKill@ infernal cinder per enemy.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro.2:NumCindersPerKill@ infernal cinders per enemy and execute enemies under @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro.2:ExecutePct@% Health.

Cinders collected: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_PyroCindersCollected@
Team %i:scaleAS%: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_PyroAttackSpeed@%
items.name: Pyro

items.desc:
For each active trait, your team gains bonus Health and Damage Amp.
(Excludes unique and Anniversary Traits)

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Jazz.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Jazz.1:BonusHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Jazz.1:BonusDamage*100@% %i:scaleDA%
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Jazz.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Jazz.2:BonusHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Jazz.2:BonusDamage*100@% %i:scaleDA%

Bonus Health: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT10_Trait_Jazz_TraitTracker_CurrentBonus@%
Bonus Damage Amp: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT10_Trait_Jazz_TraitTracker_CurrentBonus_Damage@%
items.name: Jazz

items.desc:
Your team gains a Shield and Damage Amp for each adjacent ally.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.1:ShieldAmount@ Shield for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.1:ShieldDuration@ seconds, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.1:DamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA%
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.2:ShieldAmount@ Shield for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.2:ShieldDuration@ seconds, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.2:DamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA%
items.name: Rebel

items.desc: Grant Kayle and adjacent allies in the same row @APAmt@ Ability Power at the start of combat.
items.name: Talisman of Might

items.desc: Grant Kayle and adjacent allies in the same row @ASAmt*100@% Attack Speed at the start of combat.
items.name: Talisman of Speed

items.desc:
Use this on a champion to make it the Pilot of the Mech.

[Cannot be used on champions in combat.]
[Unlimited uses]
items.name: Pilot Selector

items.desc:
At the times shown in the High Roller trait, roll a random Jinx mod:
- Rocket: Launch @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_NumRockets@ rockets at random enemies, dealing
@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.1:Spell1RocketADScalar*100@% Attack Damage + @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.1:Spell1RocketAPScalar*100@% Ability Power physical damage per rocket.
- Shield: Gain a @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_ShieldFlatAmount@ + @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_ShieldMaxHPPercentage@% max Health Shield for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.1:Spell2ShieldDuration@ seconds.
- Gold: Gain @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_GoldAmount@ gold.
items.name: Sevika's Jinxed Arm

items.desc:
Grant %i:scaleAP% @AbilityPowerPerGold@ Ability Power per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% @AbilityPowerGoldMax@ gold) and a @OnKillProcChance*100@% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% @OnKillProcGold@ gold on enemy kill.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Gold generated this game: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Item_GoldGenerated@
items.name: Goldmancer's Staff

items.desc:
Every @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.1:TickRate@ seconds your team grows, gaining bonus stats. This effect stacks up to @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.1:MaxStacks@ times.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.1:BonusResists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.1:BonusADSP@ %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.2:BonusResists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.2:BonusADSP@ %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%
items.name: Elderwood

items.desc:
Attacks have a @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_Glacial_StunChance@% chance to stun enemies for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.1:StunDuration@ second and deal @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_Glacial_BonusDamage@ bonus magic damage.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Glacial Mallet

items.desc:
Gain Boss Knuckles. When the holder first drops below @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.1:HealthThreshold*100@% Health, they become The Boss and leave combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores maximum Health and grants Attack Speed.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.1:HealPercent*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.1:AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.2:HealPercent*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.2:AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%. If they reach full Health they return to combat Pumped Up: all of their attacks and abilities deal @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.2:TrueDamagePercentage*100@% of damage as true damage.
items.name: The Boss

items.desc:
After each player combat, a random 1, 2 or 3 cost champion that usually fits your team is added to your bench for free.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Yordle.1:MinUnits@) Gain champions!
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Yordle.2:MinUnits@) If you have @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Yordle.2:NumOfThreeStarsNeeded@ or more 3 star champions, you instead gain a Yordle-Lord.
items.name: Yordle

items.desc:
Combat start: random enemies have their Health reduced.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Phantom.1:MinUnits@) Set @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Phantom.1:NumUnitsToReduce@ enemy's Health to @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Phantom.1:PercentHealth*100@% maximum Health.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Phantom.2:MinUnits@) Set @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Phantom.2:NumUnitsToReduce@ enemies' Health to @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Phantom.2:FlatHealth@.
items.name: Phantom

items.desc:
When an allied champion dies, a Doppelhellion (a one less star copy) equipped with a Red Buff will leap from the Hellion portal and join the fight!

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Hellion.1:MinUnits@) The first @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Hellion.1:NumOfUnits@ champions
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Hellion.2:MinUnits@) The first @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Hellion.2:NumOfUnits@ champions
items.name: Hellion

items.desc: Attacks grant Kayle @ASAmt*100@% stacking Attack Speed.
items.name: Scroll of Haste

items.desc: Kayle's Ability hits a wider area and deals @APAmt*100@% more damage.
items.name: Scroll of Force

items.desc: Kayle's damaging attacks and abilities @ResistPercent*100@% <TFTKeyword>Shred</TFTKeyword> and <TFTKeyword>Sunder</TFTKeyword> enemies hit for @Duration@ seconds.
items.name: Talisman of Aid

items.desc:
Your team's attacks and Abilities mark enemies. The mark stores a percentage of damage dealt to the enemy.

Marked enemies are struck by a cannonball after @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.1:BarrageInterval@ seconds, dealing the stored damage plus a flat value as physical damage.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.1:Damage@ + @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.1:DamagePercent@% damage dealt
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.2:Damage@ + @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.2:DamagePercent@% damage dealt. Every @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.2:ShotsUntilTreasure@th cannonball is replaced with a treasure chest that drops gold!
items.name: Bilgewater

items.desc:
Your team heals for a percent of their Max Health every @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.1:Duration@ seconds. If they are full Health, restore Mana instead.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.1:HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, or @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.1:ManaPct*100@% %i:scaleMana%.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.2:HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.2:ManaPct*100@% %i:scaleMana%. Always get both.
items.name: Preserver

items.desc:
Gain a Sevika's Jinxed Arm!

Combat start: roll a random Jinx mod. Roll another one:
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.1:MinUnits@) after @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.1:RollingFrequency@ seconds.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.2:MinUnits@) every @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.2:RollingFrequency@ seconds. Mods are stronger, and the holder can now hit a Jinxed Jackpot!

Mods:
- Rocket: Launch rockets at random enemies.
- Shield: Gain a shield for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.1:Spell2ShieldDuration@ seconds.
- Coin: Gain gold.

Rockets Fired: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_RocketsFired@
Shields Gained: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_ShieldsGained@
Gold Gained: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_GoldGained@
Jackpots Hit: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_JackpotsHit@
items.name: High Roller

items.desc:
Once per combat at 60% Health, become The Boss and leave combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_Boss_HealPercent@% max Health and grants @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_Boss_AttackSpeedPercent@% Attack Speed. If all allies die, The Boss will immediately return to combat.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Boss Knuckles

items.desc:
After combat, the 3 champions closest to Nomsy feed her 1 Snax per star level, adding Health and Ability Power. Nomsy's star level increases every 25 Snax!

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Trainer.1:MinUnits@) Summon Nomsy!
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Trainer.2:MinUnits@) Nomsy's Ability deals @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Trainer.2:DamageInc*100@% bonus damage
items.name: Trainer

items.desc:
Combat start: select champions Ascend and gain @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shurima.1:BonusHealthPercent*100@% maximum Health %i:scaleHealth% and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shurima.1:BonusASPercent*100@% Attack Speed %i:scaleAS%.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shurima.1:MinUnits@) The strongest champion Ascends after @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shurima.1:SecondsToAscend@ seconds.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shurima.2:MinUnits@) The @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shurima.2:NumUnitsToAscend@ strongest champions Ascend immediately.
items.name: Shurima

ability.desc: Hack the target and the nearest non-hacked enemy, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over @Duration@ seconds.

{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}

ability.desc:

When the volley ends, dash back to safety while dealing @ModifiedSlideDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target.

For the duration of the Ability, Samira is Unstoppable and has @ModifiedOmnivamp@ (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp.
